definition[0]: a pleasant smell that something has
example[0]: a yellow rose with a lovely scent
example[1]: the sweet scent of ripe fruit
definition[1]: the smell of a particular animal or person that some other animals, for example dogs, can follow
definition[2]: a liquid that you put on your skin to make it smell pleasant
definition[3]: to give a particular smell to something
example[2]: Honeysuckle and roses scented the air.
definition[4]: to suddenly think that something is going to happen or exists
example[3]: We scented danger and decided to leave.
example[4]: The press had immediately scented a story.
example[5]: The trade unions have scented victory.
definition[5]: if an animal scents another animal or a person, it knows that they are near because it can smell them
